document_data.name: Nixie Deep
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nixie Deep''' was a small region of the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The Nixie Deep was located offshore from [[Almorel]] past the [[Breaker's Rocks]] in the eastern reaches of the Lake of Mists.
document_data.History: This section of the lake derived its name from the frequent spottings of [[nixie]]s and other sea creatures.
